name: Punchinello is Helped to a Chair
description: Punchinello is Helped to a Chair; Giovanni Domenico Tiepolo (Italian, 1727 - 1804); Italy; about 1791; Pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash, and black chalk; 35.4 × 47 cm (13 15/16 × 18 1/2 in.); 84.GG.10; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Punchinello is Helped to a Chair
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash, and black chalk
